headline.main: ROOSEVELT SEEKS NEUTRALITY PLAN; Calls Hull for Talk Today on a Formula for a Possible Revision of Law

lead_paragraph: ON BOARD THE PRESIDENT'S TRAIN, Sept. 29 -- President Roosevelt will hold a White House conference with Secretary Hull on revision of the Neutrality Act tomorrow at 10 A.M., soon after arriving in Washington from Hyde Park.
abstract: Roosevelt calls Hull to conf on legis; moves forecast
snippet: ON BOARD THE PRESIDENT'S TRAIN, Sept. 29 -- President Roosevelt will hold a White House conference with Secretary Hull on revision of the Neutrality Act tomorrow at 10 A.M., soon after arriving in Washington from Hyde Park....
